fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value: - Use the body and soul of a dead player.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- Targeting a dead player will give you their ability, which can be used at any time, but only once.
- The body can then be used to attack any player.
- You can only target each player once. However, if a player dies, targeted by you, revived, then dies again, you may target them again.
